DC CODE § 31-3932.03

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Commissioner, by rule or order, may exempt an SPFC, on a case-by-case basis, from the provisions of this title that the Commissioner determines to be inappropriate given the nature of the risks to be insured.

subchapter.text: Special Purpose Financial Captive Insurance Companies.
